usefulItems: oven-proof dish (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm), slotted spoon, saucepan, fine sieve, hob, oven
title: Cod with Garlic Caramel Sauce

preparations.content: Place cod fillets skin-side down in a saucepan and add 150 g of water. Cover and simmer until fillets begin to bleach and foam, then turn off heat and keep covered for 2 minutes. Transfer fillets to an oven-proof dish (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm) and reserve cooking liquid.
Place oil in mixing bowl and heat <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add garlic and cayenne pepper then sauté <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Pour through a fine sieve, reserve oil and set aside.

Place half of sautéed garlic and 50 g of reserved cooking liquid from saucepan in mixing bowl then blend <b>2 min/speed 8<b>. Meanwhile, place remaining sautéed garlic over cod fillets. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then stir <b>2 min/speed 4<b> while slowly pouring reserved oil onto mixing bowl lid. Once combined, pour over cod.
Place remaining 300 g water in mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, weigh in spinach, sprinkle with salt then cook <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.
Arrange steamed spinach on serving plates, place cod fillets on top and drizzle with liquid caramel.
